title.rendered: Atomic Wallet Joins Binance Chain Alliance

content.rendered:
We’re excited to announce that Atomic Wallet is joining the Binance Chain Alliance and is going to be part of the community with the most promising blockchain projects, built or migrated to the Binance Chain! 

The Binance Chain Alliance is an association of blockchain projects, who have successfully migrated to Binance Chain and listed on Binance DEX. 

The main goal of the initiative is to provide support to other projects and their founders during the migration process to Binance Chain, as well as contribute to the project in a variety of different ways such as financing, technology, KYC and network announcements. 

Atomic’s Contribution to Binance Chain Alliance

Being a decentralized, custody free wallet for multiple cryptocurrencies, we intend to push and support as the cryptocurrencies adoption level, as Binance Chain precisely all over the globe. To help new blockchains in the common goal, we provide a highly-secure service to manage and list their coins with the BNB-addresses. Furthermore, we are eager to spread knowledge on our innovative technology of being able to balance between security, user experience, and effective managing of the blockchain projects.

Thank You to Cubiex

We are grateful to Cubiex eSports and Pierre Chahine, CEO of the project, for launching the Binance Chain Alliance and inviting Atomic Wallet to promote the initiative in collaboration with other projects. 

It seems inevitable that through Cubiex’s leadership, the Alliance will become one of the most prominent communities within the Binance ecosystem. We are very looking forward to it!

Binance Chain Alliance

Website: https://www.bepalliance.com

E-Mail: info@bepalliance.com 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BinanceChainAlliance

Medium: https://medium.com/@binancechainalliance

Binance DEX

Website: https://www.binance.org/en/

Telegram: https://t.me/BinanceDEXchange

Telegram: https://t.me/binanceexchange

About Atomic Wallet 

Atomic is a universal, fully decentralized, multi-asset crypto wallet that supports more than 300 coins and tokens and has a distinctively simple interface. It’s available for most operating systems, like Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and soon to be released iOS. 

Customers can secure, manage, exchange, and buy cryptocurrency in a user-friendly interface protected by a mnemonic seed. Its on-device intelligence allows storing all private keys at a user’s computer or/and smartphone, which means only they have full access to their funds.

As of exchange and buying crypto options, the Atomic Wallet enables to instantly exchange over 60 cryptocurrencies, being powered by Shapeshift, Changelly, and Changenow. Meanwhile, online-banking Simplex allows customers to buy cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Litecoin, and Bitcoin Cash with a credit card in a few clicks. The whole process takes just several minutes.

Atomic has its token AWC which is operating on Binance and Ethereum chains and is listed on Binance DEX.

For more information, please, visit us:

Twitter

Telegram

Facebook

Reddit
